dct_title_s: Hereford-shire described with the true plot of the citie Hereford as alsoe the armes of thos nobles that have bene intituled with that dignitye
dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially. "Cum privilegio". Inset map: Hereford. Pictorial view of the Battle of Mortimer's Cross (1461). Depictions of Mercator and Ortelius. Coats of arms. Title on verso: Hereford-shire. Text on verso: Book I ... Chap. 25. Pg. nos. on verso: 49-50. Signature on verso: Ff.
dct_publisher_sm: [London] : To be solde in the Popes head alley against the Exchange by Iohn Sudbury and Georg Humbell ..., 1610.
